DESCRIPTION:
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim tells us about the future of Tamriel. After the assassination of King Skyrim empire to the brink of disaster. Around potential claimants to the throne rallied new alliances and conflict flared. But fate was not enough, and soon, as predicted by the ancient scrolls, returned to the world almost forgotten evil - the brutal and merciless dragon. Now the future in the hands of Skyrim Dragonborn - the man in whose veins flows the blood of the legendary monsters. Skyrim brings the fantasy role playing open world to a new level, raising the bar to an unattainable height. New game engine allowed developers to implement a holistic virtual world in which there was a place and rocky mountains, and bustling cities and fertile fields, and ancient dungeons. Players can create a unique character and make a magical world of literally anything they want. It is in the most of Skyrim appear firm lines Series The Elder Scrolls - This game gives genuine freedom of choice and opportunity to create their own history.

GAME FEATURES:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create a unique character and make a magical world all you want.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Skyrim incorporated all the features of proprietary series The Elder Scrolls: freedom of choice, the opportunity to write the history of Tamriel and experience an unforgettable adventure.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Skyrim developed a new game engine , allowing creators to implement a holistic world in which there was a place and rocky mountains, and noisy cities and fertile fields and ancient dungeons.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Choose what is right for you , hundreds of weapons, spells, and abilities.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fight the monsters that threaten the lands of Tamriel. Playing the role of Dragonborn, Learn the secrets of ancient heroes and finding peace of their power.
